channel.title: IIM on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in IIM on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Depuis Longtemps
item.description: In recent time, there is no post in our blog. Few days back, newspaper mentioned popular blogs are drying as “twitter or facebook” becomes popular ways to communicate with readers. Many bloggers started to update about themselves in social-site or micro-blogging using SMS and original blog surffers. For us nothing as such happened; we just got super busy from busy. We were very happy that my younger brother and his wife took the pain to come over to Bangalore (10-13thJuly).
